articles.author: Mia Rabson
articles.title: Pfizer increasing vaccine shipments as Canada appeals to U.S. to help with Moderna - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: Procurement Minister Anita Anand is pushing Moderna to start shipping its COVID-19 vaccine doses to Canada from the United States instead of Europe.
articles.content:
OTTAWA - Procurement Minister Anita Anand is pushing Moderna to start shipping its COVID-19 vaccine doses to Canada from the United States instead of Europe.
